name: Winter Break Project '23
description:
A small prototype of a suimulation game built over my 2022 winter break. There is still a lot of content missing but you are able to do the basics.

What's In It?

  • Place Facilities To Collect Resources
  • Create homes and barracks to create collectors and guards to collect resources and defend structures
  • Collect resources to expand and create more facilities

What Isn't?:

  • Enemies - Enemies are technically functional but I have them disabled to counteract a host of bugs
  • Seeds - It shows up in the resources menu but you can't actually collect / use them at the moment

Future Additions:

Given some time away from the project I want to add the following faetures

  • Planting - Since the stage is finite you will eventually run out of resources I want to counteract this by creating opportunities to plant things and have them grow back
  • Bigger and Better defensive mechanisms 
  • A lot more enemy variety
  • A Bigger map 
  • Opposing Factions

Bugs:

  • A lot lol
